sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react'; import {useHistory} from 'react-router-dom'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import styles from './ProductPage.module.scss'; import {BsPlus, BsArrowRightShort} from 'react-icons/bs'; import {BiMinus} from 'react-icons/bi'; const ProductPage = () => { const history = useHistory(); const [currentProduct, setCurrentProduct] = useState(history.location.state); const [isDelivery, setIsDelivery] = useState(false); const [isDescription, setIsDescription] = useState(false); return (
{!isDelivery && Delivery } {isDelivery && <> Delivery
Our products are delivered all over Poland and each of EU Countries. If you need detail information which you can not find here, then please email info@ardurob.ar and we’ll provide you required information as soon as we can.
} {!isDelivery && Description } <> Description
{currentProduct.overview}
}

{currentProduct.name}

Read 1000 Reviews

{currentProduct.overview}

Available in stock: {currentProduct.quantity} pcs.

{currentProduct.price} EUR

Qty:

); }; ProductPage.propTypes = { }; export default ProductPage;
